availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Bruner (Breckinridge Co. State Sen)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Breckinridge County from 1857 to 1861 and from 1865 to 1869. Attorney in Hardinsburg, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge, District 1, p. 111; Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1878), 96. Find A Grave, "John B. Bruner (1825-1876)," Memorial #33933100, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/33933100 (accessed August, 3, 2017); John B. Bruner Papers, 1848-1876, Filson Historical Society, Louisville, Kentucky.
